content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=-24.5, y=32.0)
Consists of boiler(position x=-24.5, y=32.0), offshore pump(position x=-16.5, y=26.5), and pipe(position x=-24.5, y=30.5)

### Offshore pump at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position x=-16.5, y=26.5) and pipe(position x=-16.5, y=25.5)

### Pipe network at position(x=-20.5, y=25.5)
Consists of multiple pipes, including pipe(position x=-20.5, y=25.5), pipe(position x=-19.5, y=25.5), and pipe(position x=-18.5, y=25.5), connected to offshore pump(position x=-16.5, y=26.5)

### Electricity distribution network
Consists of small electric poles at various positions, including (x=7.5, y=-0.5), (x=7.5, y=2.5), (x=3.5, y=0.5), (x=7.5, y=0.5), and (x=3.5, y=2.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the entities are close enough to be connected before attempting to connect them.
- Check that the connection points of the entities are not blocked by other objects.
- Verify that the entities are compatible with each other and can be connected.

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure that the target position is empty and not occupied by another entity before attempting to place an entity.
- Check that the entity can be placed at the target position, taking into account any obstacles or restrictions.

### Errors when using pipes
- Ensure that the pipes are properly connected to the entities they are supposed to be connected to.
- Check that the pipes are not blocked or restricted in any way, and that they are able to transport fluids as intended.
